page.title: 17Health
page.content: Around Bagnall it is common knowledge that the air is clean and pure.Several of the residents we interviewed told us that they had moved to Bagnall because of the air. The air is so pure because of the height of the land and also there is not alot of traffic and there are no smoking factory chimneys. The special school Westwood Manor was situated in the area because of the clean atmosphere and the abundant wildlife. The main problem in living in this area is for sufferers of conditions like Hay Fever.
